casebody.data:
Abbott et al., Appellants, v. Haight Properties, Inc. et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Abbott v. Haight Properties, Inc. (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 8.]

(No. 99-920 Submitted September 15, 1999 Decided October 13, 1999.) Steven L. Crossmock, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for further proceedings on the authority of Denham v. New Carlisle (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 594, 716 N.E.2d 184.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Resnick, J., not participating.
